alert.note: Alert for Goliad (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 22 at 11:26AM CDT until August 22 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Goliad County in south central Texas... * Until noon CDT. * At 1125 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Fannin, or near Goliad, moving west at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Goliad around 1135 AM CDT. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 642 and 650. US Highway 59 between mile markers 664 and 680. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
